name: Kollino The Shrimp
description:
Download Kollino, The Shrimp to play with an anthropomorphic anime girl who runs through an underwater world while breaking corals and defeating dangerous fish.

This game was made for GameJam+ in 54 hours, inspired by Mantis Shrimp. The attack of these animals is often compared with a .22 bullet shot, and is considered one of the strongest punches in animal kingdom (relative to size). 

HOW TO PLAY:

Walk with WASD

Jump with space

Punch with LMB-click

Charge your punch by holding LMB, then release the button to dash!

Destroy the boats to save your progress, they are your checkpoints :D
